name: Tunnel Escape Run
description:
Tunnel Escape Run is a free fun and addictive temple themed game! Challenge endless distance, Get highest scores. Run as fast as you can, Dash, rush in the endless tunnel. Jump, slide, move left or right to avoid the obstacles.

The tunnel adventure run begins:
-Top visual effect of running
-Full of risks of kinds of obstacle
-Real scenes of beautiful
-New UI and characters
-Excited voice of running
-Solve the ultimate mystery of this tunnel

How to play this excited escape run:
-Jump, slide to avoid obstacle
-Smooth touch your phone
-Easy to run left or right
-Use prop of scores, coins
-Choose your liked characters
Join the excited tunnel run game!
